subtitle: Good for a dinner party starter, or for a buffet party when entertaining larger numbers.

method.text: Saute the shallots in 25 g of the butter for 1-2 min in a frying pan, without browning.
Add chicken livers to the pan and saute for 4-6 min until sealed. Season well.
Pour in the port and Madeira wine. Simmer carefully to reduce slightly, making sure the chicken liver is still pink.
Spoon into a blender or food processor and blend until smooth.
Add remaining butter and process well, until smooth. Add nutmeg, marjoram and adjust seasoning.
Spoon into individual serving dishes. Smooth over the surface. Leave to cool.
Meanwhile, sprinkle the gelatine onto the hot stock, stirring until dissolved.
Pour the stock evenly over the chicken liver. Arrange the thyme. Chill well until set.

title: Parfait of chicken liver
